title: Elegant Diamond Blossom Vanki (Armlet)
materials: G-H Color). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This delicate Vanki (armlet) features a repeating motif of diamond-studded floral designs, interspersed with smaller bezel-set diamonds. The overall design reflects a minimalist, contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with the bright sparkle of white diamonds.
occasions: and light festive occasions. A modern twist on a traditional ornament
description: A beautiful fusion of contemporary design and traditional significance. The high-quality diamonds add a touch of luxury, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable for daily wear and ideal for those seeking a subtle yet elegant piece.
